activities:
Chartio is a software as a service product, we query, transform and host data allowing customers to perform data analysis and visualization.

Chartio uses personal information provided by customers and prospective customers (name, contact email, phone) for sales, marketing, customer service, invoicing, payments and as part of product services.

Chartio does not own, resell or disclose any data it processes on a customer's behalf.  As a data processor Chartio uses reasonable administrative, technical, and physical security controls to protect Chartio customer personal information from loss, misuse, or unauthorized access. Customers are responsible for all other obligations related to the personal information they may collect.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data submitted by customers to Chart.io's services; customer and prospective customer contact information (name, email); visitor data; manually processed data is covered.
recoursemech: Unrelesolved compliants may be handled via the American Arbitration Association, ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program.
